channel.title: Private match breaks when going publc
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Every time we try to join a game as a group with a large enough private match (usually greater than 8 people) a lot of the people get kicked from the game and back to the main menu (while sometimes a few people get into a game). This breaks the lobby and segments the party. We're trying to play full games even if our party doesn't have 16 people.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
I expect the whole private party to get into the same game with 16 people in it.
#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Start a private match 2. Get a good amount of people in it but less than 16 (usually we have around 8 to 14 players. 3. Go public.
#### Comments:
Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn't. Usually the lobby breaks somehow. Usually some people just stay in the lobby, some people get into a game, some people get kicked. But we barely ever all get into the same public game.
